amendment.description: Amendment inserts a provision for the Historically Black Colleges and Universities Undergraduate Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 35 printed in the Congressional Record to insert a provision for the Historically Black Colleges and Universities Undergraduate Program.

action.text: Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Johnson, E. B..

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson, E. B. amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 389 - 35 (Roll no. 358).

action.text: Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Johnson, E. B..

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson, E. B. amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 387 - 31 (Roll no. 396).
